A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Awful. The side-plot involving Finn and Rose Tico made the latter the present-day Jar Jar Binks equivalent. Every scene she was in was cringe-worthy. Not her fault probably but unwatchable nonetheless. And for a sci-fi film there was a notable lack of non-human diversity (few aliens among the Resistance). Rey proved to be a one-dimensional character although there were numerous opportunities to expand it and make her more interesting. Snoke is a mystery: How did he come to power? Is he a Sith\, if so is he the reincarnated Darth Plagous? How did he come to encounter Kilo Ren? None of these were answered. So\, so very disappointing...
